content.rendered:
Air Vanuatu is an airline with its head office in the Air Vanuatu House, Port Vila, Vanuatu. It is Vanuatu’s national flag carrier, operating to Australia, New Zealand and points in the South Pacific. Its main base is Bauerfield International Airport, Port Vila.

 

 

Air Vanuatu Holidays Enquiries Contact Phone number | Email | Business hours

Australia telephone sales hours – Sydney time:

Operating hours: Mon – Fri 9am to 5.30pm, Sat Closed, Sun 9am to 4.00pm

Phone: 1300 365 361

Email: vanuatu@airvanuatuholidays.com.au

Air Vanuatu Official website: https://www.airvanuatu.com/home/contact-us/

List of Air Vanuatu Offices

Australia – Sydney
Australia – Brisbane
Australia – Melbourne
Fiji – Nadi
Fiji – Suva
Luganville, Vanuatu – Santo
New Caledonia – Noumea
New Zealand – Auckland
Solomon Islands – Honiara
Vanuatu – Port Vila (Sales)
Vanuatu – Port Vila(Administration)
Vanuatu – Tanna

Air Vanuatu Baggage Allowance

Air Vanuatu Baggage

View Air Vanuatu Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, pregnancy terms and conditions, special dietary meal requirements in the above link.
